I love the look of this purse. I've been using it for over 2 years now and it has held up considerably well. However, the one con that drives me nuts is that it doesn't always stay closed. You bump the purse into something and the clasp comes open allowing anyone access if you don't catch it in time or I'veeven had some things fall out (luckily while i was home). I've resorted to tying a hair elastic around the clasp for security when I'm out and about because I'm tired of messing with it. Not very good design.

I found several times after I closed it and wore it across my body the latch would not stay closed.  I tried tightening the top but nothing worked.  I am very disappointed.  The bag itself is great but the closure needs some work.

评论概述: Excellent size, quality and style purse!
评论详情: The Segater Women Vintage Small Retro Handbag is an excellent purse.  I wanted something retro with a solid snap vs a zipper!  It is roomy inside, has 2 pockets and 1 zipper.  The small and large handles are made very strong as well as the brackets that hold them on the purse.  It is very stylish, soft and feels like real leather!  Highly recommended and I need to get a few more colors while they are still available.  You know how this goes.....when you love something buy more because "when their gone, their gone"!!!!  Happy Customer!!!Update to my review.  The inside material isn't thick and will tear easy.  I may be to have the inside sewed with better fabric.  Still like the purse.
The purse has held up well. Everyone thinks its a cute purse. I really like it.
The leather came away from the closure part at the top. Nothing heavy was ever put in it.  Disappointed, it looked really nice
Great quality great price 💯
The color is beautiful, I’m a bit disappointed in the quality of materials but I’ll keep it because I really like the color.
I’m very pleased with my this purchase.  Love the size. Not too small and not too large.
Church  wonderful

I have been using these "kiss lock" purses for over a year now.  Other purses with zippers  were constantly ruining my nails by causing catching, spliting, and breakage.  But that's NOT a problem for me anymore.The purses are soft and come with two straps, one shoulder and one hand-carry that can be used separately.  DURABLE is a good description for them too.  (Granted, I do NOT give my purses an easy time.)My first order was for a green one on sale.  Even the green is a a soft color and goes with a lot of outfits.  I just ordered a brown one. The inside is ONE compartment so I know where my things are.  There are two small pouches id needed for smaller items.I would love to see this purse style in off-white or more summer pastels.  One can afford to buy several in different colors because of their inexpensive price.  I can NOT imagine anyone not enjoying these purses.  They are now my #1 pick!Jeanne Eanes

Quite disappointed with this purchase .....Way larger than expected given the picture and description of the item; color was off as well.  The purchase material is very soft. I ended up giving it to a friend because it was just way bigger than I needed.
Perfect size not too big not too small. Very happy with this purse.

I bought this because it reminded me of the little change purses I had as a kid. I also like unusual things that not everybody has. This is a nice size purse. It's not small and not big like a tote bag. It holds everything I carry with room to spare.

I have used this purse for a year. Usually I switch out sooner than that as I can't resist a new purse, but I really enjoy this one. I love the clasp on this purse. It is very retro. I have had no issues at all with this purse. The clasp holds good and has never popped open, unless I didn make sure it was closed properly. I use the long strap and I do not see any noticeable wear or tear. It is really a lovely purse and I think about my grandmother and great grandmother when I look at it.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for!
评论详情: Edit: it wouldn't stay shut! Kept popping open while I was out, I had to find pliers and bend the clasp so it had a tighter hold. After I did that it's only popped open when my husband shook it like crazy to test it 🤣 still recommend this purse, it's adorable and I love it?  This purse is ALMOST perfect! It's the right size for what I was looking for, I love the green color, and everything I need to bring with me fits well! The only thing I would change is the little pockets on the inside I wish were a little lower in the bag, so I could put my hand sanitizer in it, but it won't close if I do with where they are placed. But I still love it! Would highly recommend! The material feels nice, it's soft, but feels sturdy! I love the strap, it's thick which is really nice! I'll update if there's any issues with it's durability, but I'm hoping it lasts a long time! 🙂 I do wish it came with some padding inside to keep the purses shape during the shipping process, but it got here in one piece so it's fine, it was just a tad squished!
